description: System-generated unique identifier for this automated email template content record.
Identifier linking this content to its parent automated email template/header; used to group versions or variants.
Subject line used when sending the automated email; supports merge fields/placeholders resolved with asset/event data.
Main email body content (HTML/plain text) for the automated notification; supports merge fields/placeholders populated with asset, work, or alert details at send time.
Sender email address used for the outbound automated message.
User account that created this template content; typically a reference to the application’s user table.
User account that last updated this template content; typically a reference to the application’s user table.
Timestamp when the template content was created; time zone per system configuration.
Timestamp when the template content was last updated.
Flag indicating this template is for advance/pre-due notifications (e.g., before a service or PM is due); likely boolean 0/1; confirm with SME.
Tolerance or offset used for preventive maintenance notifications (e.g., days, miles, or percentage before/after due); confirm unit and behavior with SME.
Short-form message for SMS/text notifications associated with the template; merge fields supported.
